mainText:
His touch is in everything I touch... my personal computer, the computer 
in my classroom, and in the computers my students use in the computer 
lab at school.  I watch Pixar movies, I use an iphone, and plan to buy an ipad.  Apple friendly user products enchanced my 
life, made me feel smart,  made made me feel "cool", because they were 
so-o-o-o-o cool.

If there is a heaven, I'm sure he's already focused on making things 
better there too!  I believe his is a spirit that will live forever.
header: His sprit is all around us
author: Lupe
